content.question: If <math alttext="x cubed, minus 2 x y, plus 3 times y squared, equals 7" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>, then <math alttext="the derivative of y, with respect to x, equals" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo></mrow></mstyle></math>

choices.label: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator 3 times x squared, plus 4 y, and denominator 2 x, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 3 times x squared, minus 2 y, and denominator 2 x, minus 6 y, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>y</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 3 times x squared, and denominator 2 x, minus 6 y, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>y</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the fraction with numerator 3 times x squared, and denominator 2 minus 6 y, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>y</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the fraction with numerator 3 times x squared, minus 2 y, and denominator 2 x, minus 6 y, end fraction" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mn>3</mn><msup><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>−</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>−</mo><mn>6</mn><mi>y</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

unit.text: 3: Differentiation: Composite, Implicit, and Inverse Functions

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
